other.text.companyregister.phone: This number will be used for certification information verification and subsequent services. After submitting the certification, there will be a customer service phone to contact you. Please keep the phone unblocked. Failure to contact will affect your audit results.

other.text.permissions.admin.desc: Check and review emails and customers among own department members. Manage customers under the department.
other.text.permissions.generaluser.desc: Use mail functions and manage own assigned customers.
other.text.security.password.desc: A strong password can make your account more secure. It is recommended that you change your password regularly and set a password that contains at least two of letters, symbols or numbers and is longer than 8 characters.
other.text.security.email.desc: You can use your bound mailbox to receive various notifications about system, marketing and service information.
other.text.security.language.desc:
When set to Chinese, the reply and forwarding will be displayed as "Re:", "Fwd:", and the quoted content will also be displayed in Chinese.;
When set to Traditional Chinese, the reply and forwarding will be displayed as "Re:", "Fwd:", and the quoted content will also be displayed in traditional Chinese;
When set to English, the reply and forwarding will be displayed as "Re:", "Fwd:", and the quoted content will also be displayed in English.
other.text.invite.user.notfind: The user does not exist, please check if the Account/UID is correct
other.text.mailbox.blacklist.email.togar: The emails sent by blocked mailbox will be automatically put into spam box with no notification.

other.text.order.create.success.peyment: Submitted successfully, please pay as soon as possible!

other.text.ask.email.blacklist: After blocking, you will no longer receive mail from the following mailbox, sure you want to block?
other.text.bind.default.mailbox: When you have bound more than one mailbox, this will be the default mailbox you use when sending emails.
other.text.setting.bybranch.path: To set up an assignee, please set in Customer management>Customer assignment settings
other.text.customer.transfer.tip1: When member A is no longer in the position, administrator can assign all his/her customers to member B.
other.text.customer.transfer.tip2: If the customers need be assigned to different members, you can set up in the customer assignment settings.
other.text.customer.merge.tip1: When merged, the original information of Customer A, including mail address, contacts, assignees, related files and contact records will be merged into Customer B.
other.text.customer.merge.tip2: Customer A will be removed from the system.

common.customer.info3: When customer follow-up is set, customers from all accounts in the team will follow the rules shown in the form below. If any accounts (for instance: accounts belong to boss or manager) do not want to follow such rules, you can click the following button “Add a member” to add these accounts.
